name: Tiko Digital
tagline: Your Search for a Digital Agency Ends Here.
description:
Tiko Digital is a boutique digital advertising agency. We work with a wide variety of businesses and advertising agencies to build their online presence. Â Lead generation, SEO and search engine marketing are few of the services we provide.
We are a Google partner and have certified Adwords and Google Analytic experts on staff who work together with our team at Google to offer our customers the best practices and latest tools to improve and measure their online marketing efforts.
